results.title: Simvastatin improves the eradication rate of Helicobacter pylori: upper Egypt experience
results.text_hl: Results: Eradication of @<m>DISEASE_Helicobacter_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016481 @@@H. pylori infection@@@ was significantly higher in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with the standard triple therapy plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (n=41, 82%) than in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with the standard triple therapy (n=31, 62%) (P<0.022).

citations.NLM: Hassan AM, Shawky MAE, Mohammed AQ, Haridy MA, Eid KA. Simvastatin improves the eradication rate of Helicobacter pylori: upper Egypt experience Infect Drug Resist. 2019;12():1529-1534. PMID: 31239728
citations.BibTeX: @article{31239728, title={Simvastatin improves the eradication rate of Helicobacter pylori: upper Egypt experience}, author={Hassan AM and Shawky MAE and Mohammed AQ and Haridy MA and Eid KA}, journal={Infect Drug Resist}, volume={12}, pages={1529-1534}}

results.title: Randomised clinical trial: simvastatin as adjuvant therapy improves significantly the Helicobacter pylori eradication rate--a placebo-controlled study.
results.text_hl: Both the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and the placebo were taken orally twice daily for 1 week in 113 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Helicobacter_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016481 @@@H. pylori infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Nseir W, Diab H, Mahamid M, Abu-Elheja O, Samara M, Abid A, Mograbi J. Randomised clinical trial: simvastatin as adjuvant therapy improves significantly the Helicobacter pylori eradication rate--a placebo-controlled study. Aliment Pharmacol Ther. 2012 Aug;36(3):231-8. PMID: 22646167
citations.BibTeX: @article{22646167, title={Randomised clinical trial: simvastatin as adjuvant therapy improves significantly the Helicobacter pylori eradication rate--a placebo-controlled study.}, author={Nseir W and Diab H and Mahamid M and Abu-Elheja O and Samara M and Abid A and Mograbi J}, journal={Aliment Pharmacol Ther}, volume={36}, number={3}, pages={231-8}}

results.title: Statins Attenuate Helicobacter pylori CagA Translocation and Reduce Incidence of Gastric Cancer: In Vitro and Population-Based Case-Control Studies
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ exhibiting @<m>DISEASE_Helicobacter_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016481 @@@H. pylori infection@@@ who were prescribed @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, the adjusted OR for @DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@gastric cancer@@@ was 0.25 (95% CI = 0.12-0.50).

citations.NLM: Lin CJ, Liao WC, Lin HJ, Hsu YM, Lin CL, Chen YA, Feng CL, Chen CJ, Kao MC, Lai CH, Kao CH. Statins Attenuate Helicobacter pylori CagA Translocation and Reduce Incidence of Gastric Cancer: In Vitro and Population-Based Case-Control Studies PLoS One. 2016;11(1):e0146432. PMID: 26730715
citations.BibTeX: @article{26730715, title={Statins Attenuate Helicobacter pylori CagA Translocation and Reduce Incidence of Gastric Cancer: In Vitro and Population-Based Case-Control Studies}, author={Lin CJ and Liao WC and Lin HJ and Hsu YM and Lin CL and Chen YA and Feng CL and Chen CJ and Kao MC and Lai CH and Kao CH}, journal={PLoS One}, volume={11}, number={1}, pages={e0146432}}
